localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Sleegal is an online marketplace that uses machine learning to match users with lawyers. We built this website free for all to use because we believe high-quality professional service should be made accessible to everyone, not just the elite.
nodes.title: Sleegal - Find the right lawyers instantly - free for all to use

nodes.excerpt: Hue Sentiment is an easy to use Philips Hue light app which translates text into a mood. Simply type how you're feeling and notice the lights change based on your mood.

nodes.excerpt: Terapify is a video chat platform that connects people who need psychological help with vetted psychotherapists who share their culture and language in an easy, secure and affordable way.

nodes.excerpt: TextGen is a new service that allows you to train your own text generation ML models and then use them to generate text through a simple API with no AI knowledge required and at low price. You send us your text dataset, we train the model and serve it for you.
nodes.title: TextGen - Train and serve your ML text generation model using an API

nodes.excerpt: Booked solid every day and barely have time to get a coffee or even run to the restroom? Meet BreakBot. A free Google Calendar add-on that automatically adds breaks to your day when it knows you need one! Because that meeting could have been an email a break.
nodes.title: BreakBot - Auto add breaks to your calendar before you get overbooked

nodes.excerpt: It's often difficult for most people to share their thoughts and over time it builds up in them, to let people have these thoughts free and release their burden we build this app. Here everyone can write freely without being getting judged by others.
